ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains Reliability
ygData.msgSnippet: Largo s, in my exerience, will not break enchancter mez, as it is a straight debuff and does no damage. Rokenn ... From: jhenders@bogon.com
ygData.messageBody:
Largo's, in my exerience, will not break enchancter mez, as it is a straight
debuff and does no damage.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 3:11 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Chains Reliability


From: jhenders@...

On Mon, Mar 20/00, "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> I'd have been happy if it just snared, I already have Largo's to reduce
> attack speed if I need to.

AOE is no substitute for a targetted song. Not only are there still a
few places even with overcrowding where AoE can cause problems, they are
a total writeoff when an enchanter is involved.
